select * from ( select product_opt_idx, product_name, product_price, product_size, product_color from product P join product_opt O on P.product_idx = O.product_idx where product_opt_idx = ${idx}) A
join cart B on A.product_opt_idx = B.product_opt_idx;

select P.product_name as itemName, P.product_idx as itemIdx, p.product_price as itemEachPrice, (p.product_price * sum(C.product_count)) as itemPrice, sum(C.product_count) as itemAmount, (product_color || '/' || product_size) as itemOpt, PT.product_t_img from product P join product_opt PO on P.product_idx = PO.product_idx join (select * from product_t_img where product_t_img like '%_t_1.%') PT on P.product_idx = PT.product_idx join (select * from cart where cart_value=#{user_id}) C on C.product_opt_idx = PO.product_opt_idx group by P.product_name, P.product_idx, p.product_price, (p.product_price * C.product_count), C.product_count, (product_color || '/' || product_size), PT.product_t_img
